title: Can we address kassadin yet or is that too soon?
body: Kind of bothers me that he counters an entire pool of champions. Not only that, statistically he has 2 counters for mid lane that are actual mid laners. And its more of a 49% wr which is hardly a counter. Then the other "counters" are fucking bruisers like ??????????????? Riot games ?? But no no, god forbid they touch him, but nerf liss and other champions. Jesus fuck this game makes me so frustrated

replies.body: yeah kassadin needs to be nerfed, preferably by -5 movementspeed
I think that would really gut his mobility. Would probably lower his winrate by 1.5% and make him unplayable and then make him immune to further nerfs.
That's a reference to Irelia nerf am I right? :D
Maybe 5 dmg off his first item

Wait, are you serious, wow... No offense, but that is the dumbest thing I've ever heard. You can't just nerf an item because it makes a certain champion op. That could gut other champions that use that item. Unless the item is completely op for multiple champions, IE {{item:3504}} you should NEVER nerf it, because of the adverse effects it can have on other champions.
